verses.verse: וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish Now the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' had sworn בַּמִּצְפָּ֖ה <S%H4709><s%> bam-mitz-Pah in Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish There shall not any מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, at לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten of us give בִּתּ֛וֹ <S%H1323><s%> bit-To his daughter לְבִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> le-vin-ya-Min unto Benjamin לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El, to Bethel וַיֵּ֤שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-she-vu and abode שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ha-'E-rev, there till even לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; God וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U and lifted up קוֹלָ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lam, their voices וַיִּבְכּ֖וּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-yiv-Ku and wept בְּכִ֥י <S%H1065><s%> be-Chi overflowing גָדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol. sore

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And said לָמָ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah, Why יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-ye-tah come זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot in בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El; why is this come to pass in Israel לְהִפָּקֵ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> le-hip-pa-Ked lacking הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom that there should be to day מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El of Israel שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet tribe אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat, And it came to pass on the morrow וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Ki-mu rose early הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, that the people וַיִּבְנוּ־ <S%H1129><s%> vai-yiv-nu- and built שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach; there an altar וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu and offered עֹל֖וֹת <S%H5930><s%> o-Lot burnt offerings וּשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> u-she-la-Mim. and peace offerings פ Peh

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִ֠י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not עָלָ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah came בַקָּהָ֛ל <S%H6951><s%> vak-ka-Hal not up with the congregation מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei Who [is there] among all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; to the LORD כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַשְּׁבוּעָ֨ה <S%H7621><s%> hash-she-vu-'Ah oath הַגְּדוֹלָ֜ה <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah A great הָיְתָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah, become לַ֠אֲשֶׁר <S%H834><s%> La-'a-Sher who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not עָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah concerning him that came not up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֛ה <S%H4709><s%> ham-mitz-Pah to Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot He shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. be put to death

וַיִּנָּֽחֲמוּ֙ <S%H5162><s%> vai-yin-na-cha-Mu repented בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min them for Benjamin אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv; their brother וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said נִגְדַּ֥ע <S%H1438><s%> nig-Da' cut off הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet tribe אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad There is one מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El. from Israel

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh How shall we do לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <S%H3498><s%> lan-no-ta-Rim for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim; for wives וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we נִשְׁבַּ֣עְנוּ <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-nu seeing we have sworn בַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, by the LORD לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not תֵּת־ <S%H5414><s%> tet- that we will not give לָהֶ֥ם la-Hem מִבְּנוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-no-Tei-nu them of our daughters לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim. wives

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And they said מִ֗י <S%H4310><s%> Mi, What אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad What one מִשִּׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> mish-shiv-Tei [is there] of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah that came not up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <S%H4709><s%> ham-mitz-Pah; to Mizpeh וְ֠הִנֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Ve-hin-neh behold לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no בָא־ <S%H935><s%> va- had come אִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish none אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh to the camp מִיָּבֵ֥ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> mi-ya-Veish Jobesh גִּלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal. to the assembly

וַיִּתְפָּקֵ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> vai-yit-pa-Ked were numbered הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; For the people וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- else שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham was there אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, and behold [there were] none מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> mi-yo-she-Vei of the inhabitants יָבֵ֥שׁ <S%H3003><s%> ya-Vesh Jobesh גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. Gilead

וַיִּשְׁלְחוּ־ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-le-chu- sent שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there הָעֵדָ֗ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, And the congregation שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> she-neim- both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei warriors הֶחָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> he-Cha-yil; of the valiant וַיְצַוּ֨וּ <S%H6680><s%> vay-tzav-Vu and commanded אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, them saying לְ֠כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Le-chu Go וְהִכִּיתֶ֞ם <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-ki-Tem and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants יָבֵ֤שׁ <S%H3003><s%> ya-Vesh Jobesh גִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad Gilead לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> le-fi- with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev, of the sword וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> ve-han-na-Shim with the women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <S%H2945><s%> ve-hat-Taf. and the children

וְזֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var And this [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; that ye shall do כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָ֗ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char, every male וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and every אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah and every woman יֹדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> yo-Da-'at by man מִשְׁכַּב־ <S%H4904><s%> mish-kav- that hath lain זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char A man תַּחֲרִֽימוּ׃ <S%H2763><s%> ta-cha-Ri-mu. Ye shall utterly destroy

וַֽיִּמְצְא֞וּ <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-tze-'U And they found מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֣י׀ <S%H3427><s%> mi-yo-she-Vei among the inhabitants יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> ya-Veish Jobesh גִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, Gilead אַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ot hundred נַעֲרָ֣ה <S%H5291><s%> na-'a-Rah young בְתוּלָ֔ה <S%H1330><s%> ve-tu-Lah, virgins אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not יָדְעָ֛ה <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'Ah that had known אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish no man לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H4904><s%> le-mish-Kav by lying זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char; with any male וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi-'u and they brought אוֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh them unto the camp שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> shi-Loh, to Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz which [is] in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan ס sa-Mek

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-le-Chu sent כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, And the whole congregation וַֽיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru [some] to speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei to the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּסֶ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> be-Se-la' that [were] in the rock רִמּ֑וֹן <S%H7417><s%> rim-Mon; Rimmon וַיִּקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-re-'U and to call לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom. peaceably

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov came again בִּנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min And Benjamin בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, and they וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu and they gave לָהֶם֙ la-Hem הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> han-na-Shim, them wives אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom חִיּ֔וּ <S%H2421><s%> chi-Yu, which they had saved alive מִנְּשֵׁ֖י <S%H802><s%> min-ne-Shei of the women יָבֵ֣שׁ <S%H3003><s%> ya-Vesh Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad; Gilead וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not מָצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> ma-tze-'U and yet so they sufficed לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> Ken. enough

וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am And the people נִחָ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> ni-Cham repented לְבִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> le-vin-ya-Min; them for Benjamin כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had made יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because that the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> Pe-retz a breach בְּשִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> be-shiv-Tei in the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיֹּֽאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei Then the elders הָעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, of the congregation מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- shall we נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh How shall we do לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <S%H3498><s%> lan-no-ta-Rim for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim; for wives כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- since נִשְׁמְדָ֥ה <S%H8045><s%> nish-me-Dah are destroyed מִבִּנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> mib-bin-ya-Min Benjamin אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah. seeing the women

וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu, ourselves לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not נוּכַ֛ל <S%H3201><s%> nu-Chal Howbeit we may לָתֵת־ <S%H5414><s%> la-tet- not give לָהֶ֥ם la-Hem נָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim them wives מִבְּנוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-no-Tei-nu; of our daughters כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִשְׁבְּע֤וּ <S%H7650><s%> nish-be-'U have sworn בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- for the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur Cursed נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten [be] he that giveth אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife לְבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> le-vin-ya-Min. to Benjamin ס sa-Mek
